  • Apr 3, 2012

    Doing stuff, and final 365 rejects

    Now I've exhausted the stash of outtakes from last year, I'm considering starting another 365 project soon. Just have to make sure I enjoy it more this time and don't beat myself up so much about it. Some days will just be rubbish.

    Going to do some work on the site soon too. That's all I've decided about that at the moment.

  • Mar 25, 2012

    Allergy visit

    Cute cats aside, yesterday was a bit shit. Turns out Steph is allergic to Siberian cats, which are probably the most hypoallergenic breed in the world. It basically puts an end to our hopes of eventually getting a cat.

    Still, there are loads of hypoallergenic dog breeds...
